name: snikket
description: Snikket Server is a self-hosted XMPP-based messaging server aimed at family and small groups. It pairs with mobile clients to provide private chat, group messaging, and voice calls.
features: XMPP messaging: Provides secure, federated instant messaging via XMPP protocol.
End-to-end encryption: Encrypts messages with OMEMO for privacy.
Group chats: Creates encrypted group conversations with multiple participants.
Voice and video calls: Supports encrypted audio and video calling.
File sharing: Sends photos, videos, and files through encrypted channels.
Mobile apps: Native iOS and Android apps with push notifications.
Easy setup: Simplifies XMPP server deployment with guided configuration.
Invite system: Generates invitation links for adding family and friends.
Contact management: Organizes contacts with roster management.
Message history: Stores message history on server for multi-device sync.
Custom domain: Uses your own domain for professional messaging addresses.
Admin dashboard: Manages users and settings through web-based admin panel.
